section.p: This template represents a patient's occupations, lifestyle, and environmental health risk factors. Demographic data (e.g., marital status, race, ethnicity, religious affiliation) are captured in the header. Though tobacco use and exposure may be represented with a Social History Observation, it is recommended to use the Current Smoking Status template or the Tobacco Use template instead, to represent smoking or tobacco habits.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-8550, CONF:1198-10526, CONF:1198-32495 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.38"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Social History Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.38)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Social History Type 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.60 STATIC 2008-12-18 (CONF:1198-8558)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1198-8553)/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1198-19117)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1198-31868)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] value (CONF:1198-8559)

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1198-31869)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)
If Observation/value is a physical quantity (xsi:type="PQ"), the unit of measure SHALL be selected from ValueSet UnitsOfMeasureCaseSensitive (2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12839) DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-8555)
The originalText, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:1198-19222)
SHALL conform to Social History Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.38)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8548, R2.1=CONF:1198-8548)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:8549, R2.1=CONF:1198-8549)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8551, R2.1=CONF:1198-8551)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Social History Type 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.60 STATIC 2008-12-18 (CONF:1198-8558)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1198-8553)/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1198-19117)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1198-31868)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] value (CONF:1198-8559)

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1198-31869)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)
code, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] originalText (CONF:8893, R2.1=CONF:1198-19221)
originalText, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference/@value. (CONF:8894, R2.1=CONF:1198-19222)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:8895). (CONF:8895, R2.1=CONF:1198-19224)
If Observation/value is a physical quantity (xsi:type="PQ"), the unit of measure SHALL be selected from ValueSet UnitsOfMeasureCaseSensitive (2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12839) DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-8555)
The originalText, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:1198-19222)

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.38" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.38"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.38" extension="2015-08-01"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.38"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1809083325"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <author> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119"/> <time/> <assignedAuthor> <id root="MDHT" extension="393838209"/> <code code="936073723"/> <assignedPerson/> <representedOrganization/> </assignedAuthor> </author> </observation>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:8550 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.38"
Consol Social History Observation code, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] originalText (CONF:8893, R2.1=CONF:1198-19221)
Consol Social History Observation originalText, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference/@value. (CONF:8894, R2.1=CONF:1198-19222)

Consol Social History Observation reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:8895). (CONF:8895, R2.1=CONF:1198-19224)
SHALL conform to CDA Observation
Consol Social History Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8548, R2.1=CONF:1198-8548)
Consol Social History Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:8549, R2.1=CONF:1198-8549)
Consol Social History Observation SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8551, R2.1=CONF:1198-8551)

Consol Social History Observation SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:8558), which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Social History Type Value Set 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.60 DYNAMIC (CONF:8896)
Consol Social History Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:8553)
Consol Social History Observation SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] value (CONF:8559)
